description.value:
[Ally]

Prerequisites Tier 2 with the Verdant Wheel

Cost 4 Fame

Effect You can select the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.Leshy Familiar] feat as a 2nd level class feat, even if you are not a Druid. You can ignore the prerequisite of belonging to the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.classfeatures.Item.Leaf Order].
